sections.title: Radius & Diameter
animations: Fade in a thin white circle at screen center.
A cyan dot flashes twice at center.
A thin magenta line grows from center to edge.
Radius duplicates, rotates, extends to opposite side, both flash yellow.

sections.title: Cut & Rearrange
animations: White circle fills with light-blue; 8 thin white cuts appear simultaneously.
Wedges slightly separate, still touching at center.
Wedges rotate outward into a fan, gaps widen.
Alternate wedges flip 180°, interlocking into a jagged rectangle.

sections.title: Approximate Rectangle
animations: Jagged edges flash cyan twice, then smooth into straight lines.
Left edge shortens to radius length, labeled 'r' in white.
Top edge stretches to πr, labeled 'πr' in white.
Entire shape scales slightly to perfect rectangle, outline bold yellow.

sections.title: Area Formula
animations: Formula 'πr × r' fades in below rectangle in cyan.
Multiplication simplifies to 'πr²' in larger white font.
Formula scales up, rectangle fades out, leaving centered 'A = πr²'.
